name: Josh Shapiro
articles__title: Pennsylvania AG won’t let Trump ‘undermine the vote’ in his state
articles__summary: The United States Postal Service is warning most states that it may not be able to deliver mail-in ballots to election offices on time. According to the Washington Post, one of those states receiving a warning is Pennsylvania. State Attorney General Josh Shapiro talked to CNN’s Don Lemon about some advice that he would give to voters in his state.
